name: UX Designer's Portfolio template by The School of UX
description:
Professional portfolio template to boost your career prospects. Stand out from the crowd & impress the hiring manager with this high-quality UX portfolio template by professional designers with 15+ years of experience. 


19 pages of hand-crafted UX designer's portfolio showcasing each step of User Experience design part of the entire design process, including: business research → design review → user research → user journey → information architecture → accessibility & inclusive design → usability & A/B testing → business sign-off → design handover & QA → and analytics
